work.title: AI Researcher
work.description:
‚óè Skilled in foundational machine learning, encompassing both supervised (such as regression and neural networks) and unsupervised techniques.

‚óè Since the release of the initial versions of publicly available generative AI systems in 2021, I have been conducting AI research in the domain of building compliant mechanisms to address African operational inefficiencies.

‚óè I am working on an open-source leapfrog manual. It is a guideline for leveraging existing systems available in Western regions to solve African operational problems with Artificial Intelligence.
